product.name: 크래프톤 배틀그라운드 대회 (PWS)

characters.name: 게이머

appearance.face: Young Asian male with neutral expression, clean-shaven, oval face shape
appearance.distinguishing_feature: WEARING LARGE GAMING HEADSET WITH MICROPHONE on head

characters.clothing: Black long-sleeve shirt, dark blue pants, black sneakers, fingerless gaming gloves
characters.voice: Energetic and emotional, easily panicked but determined, speaks casual Korean
characters.speaking_visual: mouth opens wide and speaks expressively

characters.name: GPT

appearance.face: Simple cute face with two round black eyes on cube-shaped head
appearance.body_type: Small mint-green humanoid robot with cube body, stubby arms and legs
appearance.skin_tone: Mint green with soft matte texture
appearance.distinguishing_feature: MINT-GREEN CUBE ROBOT with WHITE CHATGPT LOGO on chest and TWO ROUND BLACK EYES

characters.voice: Calm, robotic, speaks in formal Korean ending with ~합니다
characters.speaking_visual: entire body BOUNCES up and down rhythmically, eyes BLINK rapidly

scene_setting.location: Post-apocalyptic urban street. Destroyed concrete buildings, broken windows, rubble.
scene_setting.lighting: Harsh daylight, high contrast shadows from ruined buildings.

camera_setup.texture: sharp detail on action, muzzle flash effects

mood_style.color_tone: Grey urban tones with muzzle flash highlights

audio.background: Tense music swelling to triumphant note
audio.fx: Sniper rifle shot, shell casing, echoed flashback gunshots

timeline.speaker: A
timeline.camera: Over shoulder shot, POV scope view
timeline.visual_description: A young Asian man with GAMING HEADSET and black long-sleeve shirt crouches behind cover, holding a sniper rifle. He aims through the scope and fires confidently. The shot hits the distant enemy instantly. He smirks with satisfaction, his MOUTH OPENS TO SPEAK with bravado. The mint-green cube robot stands beside him, completely STILL and SILENT.

timeline.speaker: B
timeline.visual_description: The mint-green cube robot with ChatGPT logo BOUNCES up and down as it SPEAKS, round black eyes BLINKING with approval. The gamer stands confidently beside it, MOUTH CLOSED, nodding.

timeline.speaker: None
timeline.visual_description: FLASHBACK with slight sepia tint: Quick montage of the same young Asian man with GAMING HEADSET dying repeatedly in embarrassing ways - getting shot while running, missing every shot, panicking. His past self looks scared and uncertain. MOUTH CLOSED throughout flashback.

timeline.speaker: A
timeline.camera: Close-up on determined face with scope
timeline.visual_description: PRESENT: The gamer aims through his scope with steady hands and determined eyes. His face shows resolve and confidence - a stark contrast to his past self. His MOUTH OPENS TO SPEAK with quiet determination. The robot stands STILL and SILENT in background.

scene_setting.location: Urban combat zone, ruined buildings, enemy position visible in distance.

mood_style.color_tone: Neutral daylight with warm victory tones

audio.fx: Gunshot, body fall, victory pump sound

timeline.speaker: B
timeline.visual_description: The mint-green cube robot with ChatGPT logo BOUNCES up and down as it SPEAKS, displaying stats gesture with its stubby arms. Its round black eyes BLINK. The gamer stands beside it, MOUTH CLOSED, looking surprised.
timeline.dialogue: 명중률 87%. 훈련장 효과가 실전에서 발휘되고 있습니다.

timeline.speaker: A
timeline.visual_description: The young Asian man with GAMING HEADSET's eyes widen in disbelief. His MOUTH OPENS in shock as he speaks. He can't believe he actually achieved such high accuracy. The robot stands STILL and SILENT beside him.

timeline.speaker: A
timeline.camera: Wide shot showing enemy falling, then medium on celebration
timeline.movement: pan to falling enemy, then back to gamer
timeline.visual_description: In the distance, an enemy character falls to the ground defeated. The young Asian man with GAMING HEADSET clenches his fist in victory, MOUTH OPEN speaking with excitement and realization. The robot stands STILL in background.

timeline.speaker: B
timeline.visual_description: The mint-green cube robot with ChatGPT logo BOUNCES as it responds with a warning, raising one stubby arm. Its round black eyes BLINK rapidly. The gamer's celebration pauses, MOUTH SHUT, listening.

scene_setting.lighting: Bright daylight, blue zone visible in distance, golden hour approaching.

camera_setup.texture: lush grass, tactical gear detail, facial tension

mood_style.color_tone: Vibrant greens and blues shifting to golden suspense

timeline.speaker: A
timeline.visual_description: In a grassy field, a young Asian man with GAMING HEADSET crouches low, looking exhausted and worried. He checks his body for wounds, face showing concern. His MOUTH OPENS TO SPEAK with panic. The mint-green cube robot stands nearby, completely STILL and SILENT.
timeline.dialogue: 으아 근데 체력이 얼마 안남았는데.. 구급상자 필요해

timeline.speaker: A
timeline.visual_description: The young Asian man with GAMING HEADSET breathes heavily, sweat on his face. He looks battle-worn but determined. His MOUTH OPENS TO SPEAK with tired hope. The robot stands STILL in background.
timeline.dialogue: 헉헉 이제 1명만 잡으면 탈출 할 수 있어

timeline.speaker: B
timeline.camera: Wide shot, tilt up to sky
timeline.movement: pan from characters to descending supply crate
timeline.visual_description: The mint-green cube robot with ChatGPT logo BOUNCES up and down as it SPEAKS, pointing one stubby arm toward the sky where a supply crate with red parachute descends slowly. Its round black eyes BLINK. The gamer looks up with MOUTH SHUT.

timeline.speaker: None
timeline.camera: Close-up on face, eyes darting between crate and horizon
timeline.visual_description: Close-up on the young Asian man with GAMING HEADSET. His eyes dart between the landed supply crate nearby and the distant hills where the last enemy might be hiding. His face shows internal conflict - go for the supplies or check for the enemy first? He crouches low in the grass, breathing steadily, MOUTH SLIGHTLY OPEN but SILENT. Sweat on his brow. The decision hangs in the air as golden light bathes the scene.
